dashboard.label: Universal Forwarder
dashboard.description: After you download the universal forwarder, follow the steps to install and start it, then specify the data you want to send to Splunk Light.

p.b: To set up the Universal Forwarder:

li.p: Download the universal forwarder from splunk.com to the /opt directory on the machine that will send data to Splunk Light.
Download the universal forwarder credentials to the /opt directory of the machine that will send data to Splunk Light.

ol.li: Install the universal forwarder on your operating system by following the Universal Forwarder installation instructions.
